title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{35x^4}{\left(-7x\right)}-\frac{21x}{\left(-7x\right)}$$.
speech: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following:  fraction, 35 x to the fourth, over, negative 7 x,  minus fraction, 21 x, over, negative 7 x,  .

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
